# Lomba Hadroh (Anis Lusiani)

## Rundown Lomba Hadroh

+---------------------------------------+--------------------------+
| Pembukaan                             | 19.45 - 19.50 (5 menit)  |
+=======================================+==========================+
| Sambutan                              | 19.50 - 19.55 (5 menit)  |
+---------------------------------------+--------------------------+
| Penyampaian Kriteria Penampilan Lomba | 19.55 - 20.00 (5 menit)  |
+---------------------------------------+--------------------------+
| Penampilan Hadroh                     | 20.00 - 20.48 (48 menit) |
+---------------------------------------+--------------------------+
| Penampilan Hadroh Senior              | 20.48 - 21.03 (15 menit) |
+---------------------------------------+--------------------------+
| Evaluasi                              | 21.03 - 21.08 (5 menit)  |
+---------------------------------------+--------------------------+
| Doa Penutup                           | 21.08 - 21-18 (5 menit)  |
+---------------------------------------+--------------------------+
